languages.text: "И все же — мы здесь не за этим. Наша светлость обязана отметить, сколь много Вольный Торговец сделал для Дома Орселлио, оберегая возлюбленное дитя. Мы ждали множество оборотов, чтобы иметь возможность вновь лицезреть ее светлый лик". {n}Регент переводит взгляд немигающих глаз на Кассию.{/n} "Подойди же, дитя. Нам многое предстоит обсудить".

traits.locale_text: "И все же — мы здесь не за этим. Наша Светлость обязана отметить, сколь много Вольный Торговец сделал для Дома Орселлио, оберегая возлюбленное дитя. Мы ждали множество оборотов, чтобы иметь возможность вновь лицезреть ее светлый лик". {n}Регент переводит взглян немигающих глаз на Кассию.{/n} "Подойди же, дитя. Нам многое предстоит обсудить".
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: "And yet this is not why we are here. Our Grace is obliged to note how much the Rogue Trader has done for House Orsellio by protecting its beloved child. We waited for many turns to behold her radiant visage." {n}The regent shifts his unblinking gaze to Cassia.{/n} "Come now, child. There is much we need to discuss."
languages.original_text: "И все же — мы здесь не за этим. Наша светлость обязана отметить, сколь много Вольный Торговец сделал для Дома Орселлио, оберегая возлюбленное дитя. Мы ждали множество оборотов, чтобы иметь возможность вновь лицезреть ее светлый лик". {n}Регент переводит взгляд немигающих глаз на Кассию.{/n} "Подойди же, дитя. Нам многое предстоит обсудить".

We waited for many turns to behold her radiant visage." {n}The regent shifts his unblinking gaze to Cassia.{/n} "Come now, child. There is much we need to discuss."

We waited for many turns to behold her radiant visage." {n}The regent shifts his unblinking gaze to Cassia.{/n} "Come now, child. There is much we need to discuss."

traits.locale_text: "And yet this is not why we are here. Our Grace is obliged to note how much the Rogue Trader has done for House Orsellio by protecting its beloved child. We waited for many turns to behold her radiant visage." {n}The regent shifts his unblinking gaze to Cassia.{/n} "Come now, child. There is much we need to discuss."
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: “不过，这并不是我们出现在这里的原因。我们的大人注意到，行商浪人为了保护奥赛罗家族心爱的子嗣，为此付出了巨大的努力。我们等了无数个周期，才终于见到她光彩照人的面孔。”{n}摄政王的目光转到了卡西娅身上。{/n}“来吧，孩子，我们还有很多事情要讨论呢。”
languages.original_text: "And yet this is not why we are here. Our Grace is obliged to note how much the Rogue Trader has done for House Orsellio by protecting its beloved child. We waited for many turns to behold her radiant visage." {n}The regent shifts his unblinking gaze to Cassia.{/n} "Come now, child. There is much we need to discuss."

traits.locale_text: “不过，这并不是我们出现在这里的原因。我们的大人注意到，行商浪人为了保护奥塞罗家族心爱的子嗣，为此付出了巨大的努力。我们等了无数个周期，才终于见到她光彩照人的面孔。”{n}摄政王的目光转到了卡西娅身上。{/n}“来吧，孩子，我们还有很多事情要讨论呢。”
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: «Sin embargo, no estamos aquí por eso. Nos vemos obligados a elogiar lo mucho que ha hecho {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente por la casa Orsellio al proteger a su querida hija. Hemos esperado muchas rotaciones para contemplar su radiante rostro». {n}El regente dirige su imperturbable mirada a Cassia.{/n} «Ven, pequeña. Tenemos mucho de lo que hablar».
languages.original_text: "And yet this is not why we are here. Our Grace is obliged to note how much the Rogue Trader has done for House Orsellio by protecting its beloved child. We waited for many turns to behold her radiant visage." {n}The regent shifts his unblinking gaze to Cassia.{/n} "Come now, child. There is much we need to discuss."

traits.locale_text: «Sin embargo, no estamos aquí por eso. Nos vemos obligados a elogiar lo mucho que ha hecho {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente por la casa Orsellio al proteger a su querida hija. Hemos esperado muchas rotaciones para contemplar su radiante rostro». {n}El regente dirige su imperturbable mirada a Cassia.{/n} «Ven, pequeña. Tenemos mucho de lo que hablar».
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: 「だが、ここに来たのはそのためではない。閣下は、自由開拓者が、オーセリオ家の最愛の子を守るために、どれほどのことをしてくれたか、お気づきになられるでしょう。我々は、彼女の輝く姿を見るために、幾度も待ち望んだのだ」{n}摂政はカシアに視線を移す。{/n}「さあ、来なさい。話し合うことがたくさんある」
languages.original_text: "And yet this is not why we are here. Our Grace is obliged to note how much the Rogue Trader has done for House Orsellio by protecting its beloved child. We waited for many turns to behold her radiant visage." {n}The regent shifts his unblinking gaze to Cassia.{/n} "Come now, child. There is much we need to discuss."

traits.locale_text: 「だが、ここに来たのはそのためではない。閣下は、自由開拓者が、オーセリオ家の最愛の子を守るために、どれほどのことをしてくれたか、お気づきになられるでしょう。我々は、彼女の輝く姿を見るために、幾度も待ち望んだのだ」{n}摂政はカシアに視線を移す。{/n}「さあ、来なさい。話し合うことがたくさんある」
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: "Aber deshalb sind wir nicht hier. Unser Gnaden ist nicht entgangen, wie viel {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} für das Haus Orsellio getan hat, indem es sein geliebtes Kind beschützt hat. Wir haben viele Umläufe darauf gewartet, ihr strahlendes Antlitz wiederzusehen." {n}Der Regent wendet seinen starren Blick Cassia zu.{/n} "Kommt jetzt, Kind. Wir haben viel zu besprechen."
languages.original_text: "And yet this is not why we are here. Our Grace is obliged to note how much the Rogue Trader has done for House Orsellio by protecting its beloved child. We waited for many turns to behold her radiant visage." {n}The regent shifts his unblinking gaze to Cassia.{/n} "Come now, child. There is much we need to discuss."

traits.locale_text: "Aber deshalb sind wir nicht hier. Unser Gnaden ist nicht entgangen, wie viel {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} für das Haus Orsellio getan hat, indem es sein geliebtes Kind beschützt hat. Wir haben viele Umläufe darauf gewartet, ihr strahlendes Antlitz wiederzusehen." {n}Der Regent wendet seinen starren Blick Cassia zu.{/n} "Kommt jetzt, Kind. Wir haben viel zu besprechen."
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: « Pourtant, ce n'est pas là la raison de notre présence. En protégeant son Enfant chérie, {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} a rendu un grand service à la maison Orsellio. Nous nous réjouissons de pouvoir à nouveau poser les yeux sur son radieux visage. » {n}Toujours sans cligner des yeux, le régent se tourne vers Cassia.{/n} « Venez, mon enfant. Nous avons beaucoup à nous dire. »
languages.original_text: "And yet this is not why we are here. Our Grace is obliged to note how much the Rogue Trader has done for House Orsellio by protecting its beloved child. We waited for many turns to behold her radiant visage." {n}The regent shifts his unblinking gaze to Cassia.{/n} "Come now, child. There is much we need to discuss."

traits.locale_text: « Pourtant, ce n'est pas là la raison de notre présence. En protégeant son enfant chérie, {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} a rendu un grand service à la maison Orsellio. Nous nous réjouissons de pouvoir à nouveau poser les yeux sur son radieux visage. » {n}Toujours sans cligner des yeux, le régent se tourne vers Cassia.{/n} « Venez, mon enfant. Nous avons beaucoup à nous dire. »
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: "Burada bulunma sebebimiz bu değil ama. Hür Tacir'in, değerli çocuğunu koruyarak Hür Tacir'in Orsellio Hanesi'ne ne kadar büyük bir iyilik ettiğini dile getirmek, boynumuzun borcudur. Onun ışıltı saçan görüntüsüne şahit olmak için nice devirdir bekliyoruz." {n}Naip, kırpılmayan gözlerini Cassia'ya çeviriyor.{/n} "Gel çocuğum. Konuşmamız gereken çok fazla şey var."
languages.original_text: "And yet this is not why we are here. Our Grace is obliged to note how much the Rogue Trader has done for House Orsellio by protecting its beloved child. We waited for many turns to behold her radiant visage." {n}The regent shifts his unblinking gaze to Cassia.{/n} "Come now, child. There is much we need to discuss."

traits.locale_text: "Burada bulunma sebebimiz bu değil ama. Değerli çocuğunu koruyarak Hür Tacir'in Orsellio Hanesi için ne kadar büyük bir iyilik ettiğini dile getirmek boynumuzun borcudur. Onun ışıltı saçan görüntüsüne şahit olmak için nice devirdir bekliyoruz." {n}Naip, kırpılmayan gözlerini Cassia'ya çeviriyor.{/n} "Gel çocuğum. Konuşmamız gereken çok fazla şey var."
traits.speaker: NaviLeader
